goal: Create a new goal-driven skills repository with standard V2 structure
acceptance_criteria: Repository directory is created at specified path
Templates directory is created with boilerplate files
Repository is ready for skill development

features.name: Validate Repository Parameters
features.test_scenario: Given repository name and path, When I validate inputs, Then parameters are valid and path is available
features.expected_result: Repository name is kebab-case, path exists or can be created, no conflicts

features.name: Create Directory Structure
features.test_scenario: Given valid path, When I create structure, Then all directories are created (memory-bank, templates, skills, examples)
features.expected_result: Complete directory structure matching V2 pattern

features.name: Generate about.md
features.test_scenario: Given repository metadata, When I generate about.md, Then file contains proper instructions and env var configuration
features.expected_result: about.md with frontmatter, path resolution, structure overview, skill schema

features.name: Generate README.md
features.test_scenario: Given repository metadata, When I generate README, Then file provides clear quick start guide
features.expected_result: README with concept, structure, schema, quick start, env vars

features.name: Initialize Memory Bank
features.test_scenario: Given new repository, When I initialize memory bank, Then all 6 core files are created with appropriate structure
features.expected_result: Memory bank with projectbrief, productContext, systemPatterns, techContext, activeContext, progress

features.name: Create Templates
features.test_scenario: Given template structure, When I create boilerplate files, Then templates are available for new skills
features.expected_result: Templates directory with skill.json, skill.md, script examples

features.name: Create Example Skill
features.test_scenario: Given examples directory, When I create hello-world example, Then reference implementation exists
features.expected_result: Working hello-world example skill with all components
